description: Detects suspicious calls of DLLs in rundll32.dll exports by ordinal
false_positives: False positives depend on scripts and administrative tools used in the monitored environment
Windows control panel elements have been identified as source (mmc)
name: Suspicious Call by Ordinal
query: ((process.executable.text:*\\rundll32.exe AND process.command_line.text:(*,#* OR *,\ #* OR *.dll\ #* OR *.ocx\ #*)) AND (NOT ((process.command_line.text:*EDGEHTML.dll* AND process.command_line.text:*#141*) OR (process.command_line.text:*EDGEHTML.dll* AND process.command_line.text:*#141*) OR (process.parent.executable.text:*\\Msbuild\\Current\\Bin\\Tracker.exe AND process.command_line.text:(*\\FileTracker32.dll,#1* OR *\\FileTracker32.dll\",#1* OR *\\FileTracker64.dll,#1* OR *\\FileTracker64.dll\",#1*)))))
author: Florian Roth
